subject.description: The subject, a namespace for multiple metadata entries, typically a hash digest.

policy.description: A CBOR-serialized phase-1 monetary policy, used as a pre-image to produce a policyId.

preimage.description: A hashing algorithm identifier and a base16-enocoded bytestring, such that the bytestring is the preimage of the metadata subject under that hash function.

alg.description: A hashing algorithm identifier. The length of the digest is given by the subject.

name.description: A human-readable name for the metadata subject, suitable for use in an interface or in running text.

description.description: A longer description of the metadata subject, suitable for use when inspecting the metadata subject itself.

ticker.description: A short identifier for the metadata subject, suitable to show in listings or tiles.

decimals.description: When the metadata subject refers to a monetary policy, refers to the number of decimals of the currency.

url.description: A universal resource identifier pointing to additional information about the metadata subject.

logo.description: A `image/png` object which is 64KB in size at most.

publicKey.description: An Ed25519 Public key, verifying the companion signature.
